name: Compare II: The New Levels
overview: The sequel to the puzzle hit Compare created by Markus Steinmann and released in 1994. In it you try to mimic the numeric structure of the image given to you on the right by adding an incremental 1 to a section, this in turn increments any existing numbers around it by 1, so start with the large numbers and see if you can recreate it, the game gets more difficult as you go.
